thread.title: Family Friendly Hotel Paris
thread.title_full: Family Friendly Hotel Paris - Review of Eiffel Villa Garibaldi, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: KRAKKERNJ
title: Family Friendly Hotel Paris
text:
The staff is very friendly who speak Excellent French. They take care of families with small children by assisting with warming baby bottles and special needs. I highly recommend this hotel for families traveling with small children. Very close to the most important sites in Paris. The Metro is near, however we walked everywhere because of the great location. Shopping, BistroÂ´s, Hospital, Pharmacy-Drug Store, everything you need just across the street.
Room Tip: Call the Hotel and explain what it is you need and they will be of a great service. I called and go... See more room tips
